LiveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
LiveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for participating

IgnoreCaseSensitivity.label: Ignore Case Sensitivity
IgnoreCaseSensitivity.tooltip: True if you want the word case sensitivity to be ignored when giving an answer

AcceptedPrefixes.label: Allowable prefixes in questions/answers
AcceptedPrefixes.tooltip:
Prefixes including spaces allowed in questions/answers which will
 be ignored when comparing, separated by the separator value

AcceptedSuffixes.label: Allowable suffixes in questions/answers
AcceptedSuffixes.tooltip:
Suffixes including spaces allowed in questions/answers which will
 be ignored when comparing, separated by the separator value

AcceptSimilarAnswers.label: Allow 'close enough' answers
AcceptSimilarAnswers.tooltip:
Allow answers to be accepted if they are determined to be close
 enough as determined by the threshold

AnswerSimilarityThresholdPercent.label: Similarity threshold for 'close enough' answers
AnswerSimilarityThresholdPercent.tooltip:
Similarity percentage threshold determining how much of answer
 has to match the correct answer

Separator.label: Separator
Separator.tooltip: The characters used to seperate the questions and answers

MinReward.label: Min reward
MinReward.tooltip: Minimum ammount the user wins for writing the correct answer first

MaxReward.label: Max reward
MaxReward.tooltip: Maximum ammount the user wins for writing the correct answer first

QuestionInterval.label: Interval in minutes
QuestionInterval.tooltip: Interval in minutes before switching the question

NewQuestionFormat.label: Question announcement message
NewQuestionFormat.tooltip:
Message which will be posted when a new question is announced
 {0} = Reward
 {1} = Name of Currency
 {2} = Question

ExactMatchResponse.value: That's correct! {0} was the first to answer the the question correctly with "{1}" and won {2} {3}!
ExactMatchResponse.label: Correct answer message
ExactMatchResponse.tooltip:
Message which will be posted when someone writes the correct answer first
 {0} = Username
 {1} = Answer
 {2} = Reward
 {3} = Currency

CloseMatchResponse.value: Hmmmmmm close enough... {0} was the first to answer the the question correctly (enough) with "{1}" and won {2} {3}!
CloseMatchResponse.label: 'Close enough' answer message
CloseMatchResponse.tooltip:
Message which will be posted when someone writes the correct answer first
 {0} = Username
 {1} = Answer
 {2} = Reward
 {3} = Currency

OpenQuestionsFile.label: Open Questions File
OpenQuestionsFile.tooltip: Opens 'questions.txt' that contains all questions and answers.

OpenReadMe.label: Open README File
OpenReadMe.tooltip: Opens the README.txt for this script

RestoreDefaultSettings.label: Restore Default Settings
RestoreDefaultSettings.tooltip:
Reset settings back to defaults.
Reload Scripts afterwards to see the changes in the UI!
